post:
Hello LET people , 


Durring the hollidays we will offer 50% off in any of our ssd plan using the cupon code : ssd50%off , this cupon code is recurring for life.

example of plans : 

<br />10Gb Pure SSD (raid10)

<br />5 TB Traffic/mo

<br />Price 6.99 Eur /mo , using the cupon code will be for half price.
<br />https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=356

All our vps is LXC based , you can use the cupon code in all our plans from here : https://hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/virtual-private-server-vps-ssd


Also this days we running a special offer in dedicated servers line , offer witch will not be offered anymore after this year : 

<br />Dedicated Server  (only 100 in stoc)
<br />2xE5-2450 (32 Vcore)
<br />32 gb ram
<br />1tb sata hdd (new one)
<br />1 ipv4
<br />1gbps port speed (almost dedicated)
<br />20 tb traffic included/mo
<br /> Price 37 eur/mo , if you pay yearly is 380 eur ... so less than 32 eur/mo
<br />https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=339


Also we have the storage vps in stock up to 10tb/vps . The storage vps can be found here : https://hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/cheap-storage-vps


I wish to all users from LET a happy Christmas and Happy new year !
A personal advice is for this days to be more time with your family, friends , be more good person , try to donate something , even 1 eur for some person is a fortune unfortunately .


Have A great 2019 !

Regards, 
Marius
